name: Waffle Grilled Cheese Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: waffle mix, fresh rosemary, egg, vegetable oil, milk, sharp cheddar cheese
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large bowl, combine waffle mix, rosemary, egg, oil, and milk. Stir until well combined.
Pour about ½ cup (60 g) of the batter into the waffle iron (amount may vary based on the size of the waffle iron). Cook until the waffle is golden brown.
Add slices of cheese on half of the waffle. Carefully, fold the other half on top and close the lid. Cook until the cheese is melted.
